title: Drawing, "Lunette: Painting", 1812–13
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and greyish-brown wash over black chalk with traces of graphite on rough laid paper.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Woman painting Diana of Ephesus has turned around to listen to Minerva. Apprentice draws at right. Caption as -1677: "Pittura".

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Lunette: Painting", 1812–13.
1812–13. Pen and brown ink, brush and greyish-brown wash over black chalk with traces of graphite on rough laid paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1678.
